alerts.body:

alerts.title: Payment Received
alerts.description: Your payment of ₹1150.00 for August 2025 was successful.
alerts.body: Thank you for your payment. Your bill for August 2025 has been marked as paid. Your payment of ₹1150.00 was processed successfully on 10 Sep 2025.

alerts.title: New Bill Generated
alerts.description: Your new bill for September 2025 is ready.
alerts.body: Your bill for the month of September 2025 has been generated. The total amount due is ₹1230.00 and is payable by 12 Oct 2025.

alerts.title: Payment Due Reminder
alerts.description: Your bill for August 2025 is due in 3 days.
alerts.body: This is a friendly reminder that your payment for the August 2025 bill is due on 12 Sep 2025. Please pay to avoid late fees.
